Class Room

java.lang.Object
model.levels.Room
public class Room extends Object
model, contains an inner enum Room.RoomType,s contain utility methods, primarily a class that allows working on enemies in the room.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Room.RoomType
    describes the type of the room

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(Room.RoomType roomType, int levelIndex, boolean isOpen)
      constructor of a Room instance, also initiates the enemies in the room
      Parameters:
      roomType - room type
      levelIndex - index of the level
      isOpen - room is open or not

  • Method Details

    • getRoomPath

      public String getRoomPath()
      Returns:
      room path (as string) based on the room type. ex: if the room is tutorial and its index is 0, then it builds the room path string as "levels/tutorial + levelIndex + ".txt"

    • toString

      public String toString()
      converts a room into a string. if Room.RoomType is TUTORIAL, then will return "T" + levelIndex
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      room type as string

    • deactivateAllEnemies

      public void deactivateAllEnemies()
      used to deactivate all enemies in the room. (unused)

    • deactivateAllDrones

      public void deactivateAllDrones()
      deactivates every Drone in the room

    • deactivateAllDogs

      public void deactivateAllDogs()
      deactivates every Dog in the room
